Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Marina
Reviews.Content: This is a very light camera. I'm still exploring its resources, but I can say pictures look really nice. Recomended.

Reviews.Title: Great lens
Reviews.Author: Johan Askowitz
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera to Nature Photographers because of the long lens.  Great results in different weather conditions. Good zoom.

ProductInfo.Features:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ70 Digital Camera
16GB Memory Card + High Speed Memory Card Reader
2 Extended Life Replacement Batteries + AC/DC Rapid Travel Charger
Mini HDMI Cable + Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit
Carrying Case
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FZ70 16.1 MP Digital Camera Kit with 60x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black).
